arts.ttl: Fiorentina coach Stefano Pioli at risk following loss to Lecce; Inter beats Verona
arts.sum: Earlier, Inter Milan moved within one point of Serie A leader Napoli with a 2-1 win at Hellas Verona that was decided with a stoppage-time own goal. Pioli led AC Milan to the Serie A title in 2022 then coached Cristiano Ronaldo at Al Nassr in Saudi Arabia before joining Fiorentina.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Fiorentina 0-1 Lecce: Pioli nightmare goes from bad to worse
arts.sum: The Fiorentina crisis just keeps getting worse with a humiliating 1-0 home defeat to Lecce,...

arts.ttl: Fiorentina vs. Lecce to escape the danger zone
arts.sum: There have been 20 official meetings between the sides in Tuscany: 11 Fiorentina wins (most recent 1–0 in last season’s Serie A), five draws (most recent 2–2 in 2023/24) and four Lecce victories (most recent 1–0 in 2019/20). Fiorentina are still without a win in Serie A 2025/26 after nine matchdays.
Serie A is providing intriguing narratives at the top and bottom of the table and Elliott Bretland has correct-score picks for all ten Serie A matches this weekend.
